title: Shiroi Machi no Yoru-tachi
sinopse: Ayako is a young student in Tokyo, fashion school. Yet, little motivated, it does not find the inspiration to create satisfactory and original designs. But thanks to the amulet around her neck, an unexpected opportunity will open up to her: Hodja, a Turkish immigrant, will offer him to work as a waiter in Akşehir, his little restaurant strayed in the heart of Shinjuku.
